tool_description: Creates and attaches persistent storage volumes to instances with specified performance characteristics and backup policies.

volume_type.description: Storage type: ssd, hdd, nvme, network-ssd

target_instance_id.description: Instance ID to attach the volume

error_messages: Volume size out of range: Must be between 1 and 16384 GB.
Invalid volume type: Use one of [ssd, hdd, nvme, network-ssd].
Target instance not found: Verify target_instance_id exists and is accessible.
Volume creation failed: Check storage quota limits and regional availability.
Attachment failed: Target instance may not support additional volume attachments.
usage: Specify volume characteristics and optionally attach to an instance. The tool creates persistent storage with specified performance and security settings.

volume_id.description: Unique identifier for the created volume

device_path.description: Device path for mounting the volume
